He is the member of advisory board of Indian Writers Association. He is best known for his poem "Father, Wake Us In Passing". He founded Poetry Chain journal and website with Tapan Kumar Pradhan. == References == Category:Indian poets Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Indian poets
